item.description:
Let's do a 5 mile loop at the Barre Falls Dam taking the fire roads. We'll hike Coldbrook Road to Wood Road, over the 3 dikes, loop back up Kitchen's Fire Road and rejoin Coldbrook Road. This should take about 2.5 hours.

Directions to Barre Falls Dam:
When heading west on Route 62, travel 2.2 miles from the intersection of Routes 62 and 68, then turn left onto the dam access road [Coldbrook Road]. Heading east, travel about 4.3 miles from Barre's town square, then turn right onto the dam access road. There is a sign for the dam at the turn.
Following the Coldbrook Road for about 1 mile, pass by the first parking lot on the left, drive over the spill way and park on the left near the picnic shelter. I have a Black Toyota Corolla.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Barre Falls Dam Hike
